description: A bookish cohort of Yue and Nodoka in the Library Explorers Club, Haruna is a bit of a rumourmonger. She can often be found holding a saucy manga under her arm; sometimes one of her own creation! Fancying herself a matchmaker, Haruna assists Yue in pushing Nodoka toward a confession of her desire for Negi.
name: Saotome Haruna
